0.text: Innate - Resonance: Ekko's basic attacks  on-hit and damaging abilities apply a stack of Resonance to enemies for 4 seconds, refreshing on subsequent applications and stacking up to 3 times. The third stack consumes them all to deal 30 − 140 (based on level) (+ 80% AP) bonus magic damage. Z-Drive Resonance deals 300% damage against  monsters.
0.html: Innate - Resonance: Ekko's basic attacks on-hit and damaging abilities apply a stack of Resonance to enemies for 4 seconds, refreshing on subsequent applications and stacking up to 3 times. The third stack consumes them all to deal 30 − 140 (based on level) (+ 80% AP) bonus magic damage. Z-Drive Resonance deals 300% damage against monsters.
markedPassages: on-hit
monsters

1.text: Resonance cannot affect the same target more than once every few seconds.
1.html: Resonance cannot affect the same target more than once every few seconds.

2.text: Innate - Stolen Time: Triggering Resonance against a  champion grants Ekko 50 / 60 / 70 / 80% (based on level)  bonus movement speed for 2 / 2.5 / 3 (based on level) seconds.
2.html: Innate - Stolen Time: Triggering Resonance against a champion grants Ekko 50 / 60 / 70 / 80% (based on level)  bonus movement speed for 2 / 2.5 / 3 (based on level) seconds.
markedPassages: champion
bonus movement speed

0.text: Active: Ekko throws a temporal grenade in the target direction that deals magic damage to enemies hit.
0.html: Active: Ekko throws a temporal grenade in the target direction that deals magic damage to enemies hit.

1.text: At 700 units or upon hitting an enemy  champion, the grenade slows down for 1.75 seconds to gradually expand into a Temporal Sickness field that  slows nearby enemies, travelling for another 190 units.
1.html: At 700 units or upon hitting an enemy champion, the grenade slows down for 1.75 seconds to gradually expand into a Temporal Sickness field that slows nearby enemies, travelling for another 190 units.
markedPassages: champion
slows

2.text: Afterwards, the grenade contracts and homes back to Ekko at an increased speed, dealing magic damage to enemies hit.
2.html: Afterwards, the grenade contracts and homes back to Ekko at an increased speed, dealing magic damage to enemies hit.

3.text: Enemies can be hit only once per pass.
3.html: Enemies can be hit only once per pass.
possibleConcerningAbilities: Enemies can be hit only once per pass.

0.text: Passive: Ekko's basic attacks deal bonus magic damage equal to 3% (+ 3% per 100 AP) of the target's missing health to enemies below  30% of their maximum health. The damage has a minimum threshold of 15 and is capped at 150 against  minions and  monsters.
0.html: Passive: Ekko's basic attacks deal bonus magic damage equal to 3% (+ 3% per 100 AP) of the target's missing health to enemies below  30% of their maximum health. The damage has a minimum threshold of 15 and is capped at 150 against minions and monsters.
markedPassages: 3% (+ 3% per 100 AP) of the target's missing health
3% (+ 3% per 100 AP) of the target's missing health
30% of their maximum health
minions
monsters

1.text: Active: Ekko calls upon an afterimage that bats a device to the target location, granting  sight of the area for 2.5 seconds after 2 seconds. After 3 seconds, the device will expand for 1.5 seconds,  slowing enemies within the area by 40%.
1.html: Active: Ekko calls upon an afterimage that bats a device to the target location, granting sight of the area for 2.5 seconds after 2 seconds. After 3 seconds, the device will expand for 1.5 seconds, slowing enemies within the area by 40%.
markedPassages: sight
slowing

2.text: If Ekko enters the expansion after the device lands, it detonates to  shield him for 2 seconds and  stun all enemies within the area for 2.25 seconds.
2.html: If Ekko enters the expansion after the device lands, it detonates to shield him for 2 seconds and stun all enemies within the area for 2.25 seconds.
markedPassages: shield
stun

3.text: Enemies can see the indicator for Parallel Convergence after 2 seconds.
3.html: Enemies can see the indicator for Parallel Convergence after 2 seconds.
possibleConcerningAbilities: Enemies can see the indicator for Parallel Convergence after 2 seconds.

0.text: Active: Ekko  dashes in the target direction, then empowers his next basic attack within 3 seconds to have a 0.25-second cast time, gain  300 bonus range, cause him to  blink within 125 range of the target, and deal bonus magic damage.
0.html: Active: Ekko dashes in the target direction, then empowers his next basic attack within 3 seconds to have a 0.25-second cast time, gain  300 bonus range, cause him to blink within 125 range of the target, and deal bonus magic damage.
markedPassages: dashes
300 bonus range
blink

1.text: Phase Dive  resets Ekko's basic attack timer. Ekko can cast any of his abilities during the dash.
1.html: Phase Dive resets Ekko's basic attack timer. Ekko can cast any of his abilities during the dash.
markedPassages: resets
possibleConcerningAbilities: Phase Dive  resets Ekko's basic attack timer. Ekko can cast any of his abilities during the dash.

0.text: Passive: Upon learning Chronobreak or if its current cooldown is lower than 4 seconds, Ekko reveals a time-delayed afterimage of himself that constantly tracks where he was 4 seconds ago.
0.html: Passive: Upon learning Chronobreak or if its current cooldown is lower than 4 seconds, Ekko reveals a time-delayed afterimage of himself that constantly tracks where he was 4 seconds ago.

1.text: Active: Ekko enters  stasis at the start of the cast time, and afterwards  heals himself and  dashes to his afterimage's current location over 0.5 seconds. Upon arrival, the stasis ends and he generates an explosion that deals magic damage to all nearby enemies.
1.html: Active: Ekko enters stasis at the start of the cast time, and afterwards heals himself and dashes to his afterimage's current location over 0.5 seconds. Upon arrival, the stasis ends and he generates an explosion that deals magic damage to all nearby enemies.

1.content: 100 / 150 / 200 (+ 60% AP) (+ 3% per 1% of health lost in the past 4 seconds)

markedPassages: stasis
heals
dashes
possibleConcerningAbilities: per 1% of health lost in the past 4 seconds

2.text: Ekko is immune to all  displacements during Chronobreak.
2.html: Ekko is immune to all displacements during Chronobreak.
markedPassages: displacements
possibleConcerningAbilities: Ekko is immune to all  displacements during Chronobreak

possibleConcerningAbilities: Ekko is immune to all  displacements during Chronobreak

concerningSkills.skillName: ekko is immune to all displacements during chronobreak

st_flatStats0.concerningText: If Ekko enters the expansion after it lands, it detonates to  shield him for 2 seconds and  stun all enemies within the area for 2.25 seconds.
If Ekko enters the expansion after it lands, it detonates to  shield him for 2 seconds and  stun all enemies within the area for 2.25 seconds.

At 700 units or upon hitting an enemy  champion, the grenade slows down for 1.75 seconds to gradually expand into a Temporal Sickness field that  slows nearby enemies, travelling for another 190 units.
If Ekko enters the expansion after it lands, it detonates to  shield him for 2 seconds and  stun all enemies within the area for 2.25 seconds.

scalingPart: % per 1% of health lost in the past 4 seconds

st_flatStats1.concerningText: Active: Ekko enters  stasis at the start of the cast time, and afterwards  heals himself and  dashes to his afterimage's current location over 0.5 seconds. Upon arrival, the stasis ends and he generates an explosion, dealing magic damage to all nearby enemies.

0.concerningText: At 700 units or upon hitting an enemy  champion, the grenade slows down for 1.75 seconds to gradually expand into a Temporal Sickness field that  slows nearby enemies, travelling for another 190 units.
